name: AWS CloudSearch
description: Amazon CloudSearch is a managed service in the AWS Cloud that makes it simple and cost-effective to set up, manage, and scale a search solution for your website or application.nAmazon CloudSearch supports 34 languages and popular search features such as highlighting, autocomplete, and geospatial search. For more information, see Benefits.
